products.product_title: COLORPRO DTF CUSTOM TRANSFER BUSINESS PACKAGE
products.description:
DTF (Direct to Film) is the topic of conversation lately, but the equipment to make these transfers can be costly and time consuming with the maintenance required. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to stay current with the market, let us print your DTF transfers for you. This package includes the popular TransPro Slide 15x15 heat press and 5 coupons valued at $10 each. Use our online designer to create or upload your design and we will print and ship your DTF transfers.

TransPro® 15x15 Heat Press

This is the USA's most popular heat press with hundreds of 5-star reviews. The TransPro® 15x15 heat press is the perfect choice for the beginner or those looking for an additional high-quality machine. It is ideal for all heat-applied products such as transfers, vinyl, rhinestones, sublimation, etc. The many features include slide out lower platen, digital controls, ‘easy turn’ pressure adjustment, a nonstick heating surface, a silicone rubber base pad, and a comfortable, cushioned, handle. All are backed by a one-year warranty and the industry’s best customer service.

5x $10 ColorPro DTF Custom Transfer Coupons

As a part of this package you will also receive five $10 coupons for ColorPro DTF Custom Transfers. The entire value of the coupon must be used on a single order). ColorPro DTF is our newest addition to custom transfers and offers NO MINIMUMS. That’s right - you can order just 1 gang sheet. This Direct to Film transfer is soft, yet durable and offers amazing color! Fill up the sheet with different designs and sizes, and we’ll print and ship them to you at one low cost.

(1 coupon per order. Cannot be combined with other coupons or promotions. The entire value of the coupon must be used on a single order.) *Coupons codes expire 3 months after receipt.

products.description:
Save on all the direct to film supplies you need to get printing with your DTF Station Prestige R2 DTF Printer!

Color Prime Hot Melt Powder

Formulated to use during DTG Transfer (DTF), this white adhesive powder is crucial for this new technology. Cover your DTG Transfer media with this powder for optimal press. This can be used for 100% cotton, poly, nylon, and more!

DTF Station Color Prime Universal Peel DTF Film

Create rich colored DTF prints with DTF Station film. This film offers a high Ink loading layer, allowing you to lay down more color/white to achieve vibrant prints. Print your design on the single sided matte film and peel warm reducing any long wait times.

Color Prime Ink

Engineered for DTF printing. These inks offers an even and consistent texture without any loss in color vibrancy. Features a high color density and wide color gamut.

Cleaning Solution & Supplies

The Prestige DTF Printer Cleaning Solution, alcohol, wipes, and swabs are suitable for running maintenance on DTF printing machines. Cleaning regularly will extend the life of your printer and ensure smooth maintenance.

What's Included:
  • (1) Color Prime Universal Peel DTF Film - 13" x 109 yd Roll
  • (1) Color Prime DTF Pigment Ink - Cyan
  • (1) Color Prime DTF Pigment Ink - Magenta
  • (1) Color Prime DTF Pigment Ink - Yellow
  • (1) Color Prime DTF Pigment Ink - Black
  • (1) Color Prime DTF Pigment Ink - White
  • (1) Color Prime Hot Melt Powder - 1 kg
  • (1) Prestige DTF Printer Cleaning Solution - 1kg
  • (1) DTF Station Isopropyl Alcohol - 16oz
  • (1) DTF Station Lintless Wipe 4X4 - 30pk
  • (1) DTF Station 7" Cleaning Swabs - 50pk

This item will ship from the manufacturer. A $50.00 shipping charge will be added at checkout.

Prestige R2 DTF Printer

Print with precision and flair with the Prestige R2 DTF Printer! With its chic, integrated design, this printer combines elegant desktop convenience with powerful performance for all those looking to get started with DTF. Enjoy sheet or roll printing with optimized accuracy and stunning results. Experience the best of both worlds with the Prestige R2!

Phoenix Air 16x20 Curing Oven

The Phoenix Air 16x20 Curing Oven is perfect for curing large film sizes, such as 13" x 19", 14" x 16", 16" x 20", and more! This oven comes with a purifier unit built-in to ensure the safety of your production space. It has a digital control unit that is easy to set and allows precise settings of temperature and time for consistent results. A fusing process is started at the touch of a button. After the set time has elapsed, an acoustic signal sounds alerting you to remove the transfer film.

This package is the ideal start to your DTF printing journey. The Prestige A4 DTF printer and Phoenix Air Curing Oven are just the right amount of equipment for hobbyists wanting to print DTF transfers. The package also includes ink, film, powder, and cleaning supplies for all your printing needs. Also included with this package is a free live technical training session with a DTF expert to help with the printer setup and answer any questions you may have.

Prestige A4 DTF Printer

Presenting the Prestige A4 DTF Printer! Perfect for garment printing enthusiasts starting out with direct to film printing. It ensures high-quality and reliable results at 9 square feet per hour, and its compact design means you can place this printer just about anywhere. The front control panel displays room temperature and humidity so you can adjust the environment for optimal printing. The printer also includes a front heating plate which removes excess moisture from the printed film and prevents ink bleeding. The temperature of the heating plate is displayed on the control panel.

Phoenix Air 16x20 Curing Oven

The Phoenix Air 16x20 Curing Oven is perfect for curing large film sizes, such as 13" x 19", 14" x 16", 16" x 20", and more! This oven comes with a purifier unit built-in to ensure the safety of your production space. It has a digital control unit that is easy to set and allows precise settings of temperature and time for consistent results. A fusing process is started at the touch of a button. After the set time has elapsed, an acoustic signal sounds alerting you to remove the transfer film.

The Prestige A4 + Shaker + Oven is the perfect combination of equipment for individual DTF production. Once the design prints, trim it from the roll, place it in the shaker for the powder application, and cure the transfer in the oven. The package also includes ink, film, powder, and cleaning supplies for all your printing needs. DTF Station Color Prime Universal Peel DTF Film

Color Prime Inks

Color Prime UV Ink & Solutions Use & Storage Instructions
  • Use in normal temperature (56°F - 95°F).
  • Protective Gear: When handling UV DTF ink, always wear gloves, safety goggles, and a lab coat or apron to prevent skin contact and eye exposure.
  • Ventilation: Work in a well-ventilated area or use exhaust fans to remove fumes and maintain good air quality. Avoid inhaling fumes or vapors.
  • Skin Contact: In case of accidental skin contact, immediately wash the affected area with soap and water. If irritation or redness persists, seek medical attention.
  • Eye Contact: If UV DTF ink comes into contact with your eyes, rinse them with plenty of clean, lukewarm water for at least 15 minutes and seek immediate medical attention.
  • Ingestion: Never ingest UV DTF ink. If accidentally ingested, contact a poison control center or seek medical help immediately.
  • Storage: Store in a well ventilated place in original, properly labeled container between 41°F to 104°F. Keep away from sunlight. Keep container closed. Keep out of the reach of children and pets.
  • Mixing and Dilution: Do not mix UV DTF ink with other substances unless explicitly instructed by the manufacturer. Improper mixing can result in hazardous reactions.
  • Disposal: Dispose of used ink and containers in accordance with local, state, and federal regulations. Avoid pouring ink down drains or into the environment.

products.product_title: UNINET 1000 DTF PRINTER AND OVEN PACKAGE
products.description:
$96 Savings
$25 In Coupons

UNINET 1000 13" DTF Printer

The UNINET DTF 1000 is an ink-based direct-to-film digital transfer printing system capable of printing up to 13" wide (A3+). It is best suited for the short-volume production of full color transfers for the digital apparel decorating market. This 13" print width, desktop-sized DTF printer is compact yet powerful, expertly configured with a roll feeder and capable of producing simple or intricate, colorful weedless digital transfers in a single pass.

UNINET DTF 14" Powder Applicator & Oven

The UNINET DTF 14" Powder Applicator and Curing Machine can cure DTF film rolls and work as an in-line addition with the DTF 1000 (or any roll-to-roll Direct to Film printer). Take your DTF pipeline to the next level with automatic DTF powder application and drying. For optimal performance maintain a humidity level of over 50% when working with DTF inks and films.

Why Is The UNINET 1000 Printer So Great?

  • Printer Roll Feeder With Auto-Feeding Capabilities
  • Ink Tanks With Continuous Feed System
  • Bluetooth Humidity And Temperature Sensor
  • Internal Controllable Vacuum Suction (prevents film buckling)
  • White Ink Circulation Engine (helps circulate white ink)

The UNINET DTF 1000 Printer System Includes:

  • High-Definition Professional Inkjet Printhead.
  • UNINET DTF ProRIP Advanced RIP Software: Features exceptional file preparation, white and color management, production automation functionality, and more.
  • UNINET DTF Master Class Video Training Series: Discover everything there is to know about DTF printing, maximize the value of your equipment, and be inspired to expand your business even further.
  • UNINET DTF Five-Color Inks (CMYK + White)
  • UNINET DTF Powder
  • UNINET DTF Film Roll – 100 Meters
  • UNINET DTF Cleaning Solutions, Supplies & Hygrometer

IMPORTANT: This equipment requires a well-ventilated area with a filtration system. Use protective gear when working with DTF products and processes since fumes might be harmful. DTF inks and film/sheets need an adequate humidity environment - above 50% - 65% humidity is strongly advised to reduce the possibility of ink clogs and film buckling.

products.product_title: DTF A4 STARTER BUNDLE- PRINTER, OVEN & HEAT PRESS
products.description:
$191 Savings
$25 In Coupons

Everything you need for successful DTF printing is available in one complete package. The Prestige A4 DTF printer combined with the Phoenix Air Curing Oven and TransPro DTF Heat Press provides a high quality DTF printing workstation. The package also includes ink, film, powder, and cleaning supplies for all your printing needs. This package includes a free live technical training session with a DTF expert to help with the printer setup and answer any questions you may have.

TransPro® Plus DTF Heat Press

This is the only heat press on the market specifically designed with A3+ DTF prints in mind. Use one of the interchangeable platens available (sold separately) for smaller designs or garments. The heat press is constructed with a heavy-duty, durable frame with a slide-out threadable lower platen that is built to last. With a quick flip of the semi-auto release fob, the heat press can change from a semi-auto to a manual unit. Not only can you press DTF transfers, but with the TransPro Plus DTF Heat Press, you can also press sublimation, heat transfer vinyl, screen print heat transfers, and much more.

Prestige A4 DTF Printer

Presenting the Prestige A4 DTF Printer! Perfect for garment printing enthusiasts starting out with direct to film printing. It ensures high-quality and reliable results at 9 square feet per hour, and its compact design means you can place this printer just about anywhere. The front control panel displays room temperature and humidity so you can adjust the environment for optimal printing. The printer also includes a front heating plate which removes excess moisture from the printed film and prevents ink bleeding. The temperature of the heating plate is displayed on the control panel.

Phoenix Air 16x20 Curing Oven

The Phoenix Air 16x20 Curing Oven is perfect for curing large film sizes, such as 13" x 19", 14" x 16", 16" x 20", and more! This oven comes with a purifier unit built-in to ensure the safety of your production space. It has a digital control unit that is easy to set and allows precise settings of temperature and time for consistent results. A fusing process is started at the touch of a button. After the set time has elapsed, an acoustic signal sounds alerting you to remove the transfer film.

Color Prime Hot Melt Powder

Formulated to use during DTG Transfer (DTF), this white adhesive powder is crucial for this new technology. Cover your DTG Transfer media with this powder for optimal press. This can be used for 100% cotton, poly, nylon, and more!

DTF Station Color Prime Universal Peel DTF Film

Create rich colored DTF prints with DTF Station film. This film offers a high Ink loading layer, allowing you to lay down more color/white to achieve vibrant prints. Print your design on the single sided matte film and peel warm reducing any long wait times.

Color Prime Ink

Engineered for DTF printing. These inks offers an even and consistent texture without any loss in color vibrancy. Features a high color density and wide color gamut.

Cleaning Solution & Supplies

The Prestige DTF Printer Cleaning Solution, alcohol, wipes, and swabs are suitable for running maintenance on DTF printing machines. Cleaning regularly will extend the life of your printer and ensure smooth maintenance.

Color Prime UV DTF Film - A & B Rolls

Our Color Prime UV DTF Film is a game-changer, perfectly complementing UV DTF Printers to produce vibrant, detailed, and long-lasting prints. Say farewell to blurred pixels and hello to captivating sharpness and a wide range of colors with every print. Elevate your artwork and leave a lasting impression!

Color Prime UV DTF Ink

A specially formulated, fast-drying ink that quickly cures under ultraviolet light. Unlike traditional inks, this innovative solution eliminates the need for air exposure, providing rapid drying times that are perfect for printing businesses. Note: Due to its curing properties, it is recommended to keep UV DTF ink in a well ventilated place in original, properly labeled container away from sunlight. See product label for full use and storage instructions.

Maintenance & Cleaning Solution

The optimal choice for cleaning your UV DTF printer. Specially formulated to cater to the unique needs of UV DTF printers, this maintenance solution is a necessity for the health and longevity of any UV DTF printing setup.

  • Usage & Expiration: Recommended to use film within 2-4 weeks of opening for most optimal printing results. Unopened packaging lasts approx. 1 year.
Color Prime Cleaning & Maintenance Solution Features
  • Powerful Cleaning Action: Color Prime UV DTF Maintenance Solution boasts a potent formula designed to effectively remove ink residues, dust, and other contaminants from your printer's components.
  • Gentle on Equipment: Formulated with DTF Station UV DTF printers in mind, this maintenance solution is powerful but gentle, preventing any potential damage while maintaining optimal functionality.
Color Prime UV Ink Specifications
  • Size: 1kg
  • Colors: CMYKW + Varnish
  • Download The Color Prime UV Ink Safety Data Sheet.
Color Prime UV Ink & Solutions Use & Storage Instructions
  • Use in normal temperature (56°F - 95°F).
  • Protective Gear: When handling UV DTF ink, always wear gloves, safety goggles, and a lab coat or apron to prevent skin contact and eye exposure.
  • Ventilation: Work in a well-ventilated area or use exhaust fans to remove fumes and maintain good air quality. Avoid inhaling fumes or vapors.
  • Skin Contact: In case of accidental skin contact, immediately wash the affected area with soap and water. If irritation or redness persists, seek medical attention.
  • Eye Contact: If UV DTF ink comes into contact with your eyes, rinse them with plenty of clean, lukewarm water for at least 15 minutes and seek immediate medical attention.
  • Ingestion: Never ingest UV DTF ink. If accidentally ingested, contact a poison control center or seek medical help immediately.
  • Storage: Store in a well ventilated place in original, properly labeled container between 41°F to 104°F. Keep away from sunlight. Keep container closed. Keep out of the reach of children and pets.
  • Mixing and Dilution: Do not mix UV DTF ink with other substances unless explicitly instructed by the manufacturer. Improper mixing can result in hazardous reactions.
  • Disposal: Dispose of used ink and containers in accordance with local, state, and federal regulations. Avoid pouring ink down drains or into the environment.

Sublimation is so versatile, especially when you have a TransPro heat press and a TransPro tumbler mug press at your fingertips. This package also includes a Sawgrass Virtuoso sublimation printer, supplies, and a variety of our most popular sublimation blanks and drinkware. The sublimation blanks are all different materials, so you can experiment to find your favorite products. With over 300 sublimation blanks to choose from on Pro World, you can take your sublimation business to the next level with this package.

TransPro® 15x15 Heat Press

This is the USA's most popular heat press with hundreds of 5-star reviews. The TransPro® 15x15 heat press is the perfect choice for the beginner or those looking for an additional high-quality machine. It is ideal for all heat-applied products such as transfers, vinyl, rhinestones, sublimation, etc. The many features include slide out lower platen, digital controls, ‘easy turn’ pressure adjustment, a nonstick heating surface, a silicone rubber base pad, and a comfortable, cushioned, handle. All are backed by a one-year warranty and the industry’s best customer service.

TransPro® Plus Mug Press

Our next generation of TransPro Mug Presses has arrived! The extra long heating element gives you the ability to easily print any size skinny tumbler - including a 20oz or 30 oz skinny tumbler! The digital control panel with colorful display is simple and the stable structure makes this machine light weight and easy to operate. This press also includes a standard mug heating element to print 11 oz or 15 oz mugs and 2, 20oz skinny tumblers to get you started. We also offer other interchangeable heating elements (sold separately) to expand the type of drinkware you can sublimate on. We offer a wide latte style for printing 15 oz tapered drinkware, and a larger standard style for printing on a 30oz tumbler.

High Performance Sublimation Printer

The SG500 has the pro-level print consistency and versatile dimensions of its predecessor, the SG400, but has been updated from the inside out. In addition to design improvements such as a single roll-bar, the SG500 is more energy-efficient, prints with higher resolution, and offers WiFi connectivity. This means you’ll enjoy higher quality products and greater ease of use, at a price comparable to the previous model.

FREE - DesignMate Software

Access hundreds of free, customizable templates and tools to create eye-catching sublimation designs with ease. Transform your ideas into stunning masterpieces and elevate your sublimation projects with DesignMate. Check out DesignMate+ to unlock even more features, tools and templates.

Sublimation Inks and Paper

You get a set of 4 color (CYMK) SubliJet-UHD Ink standard-capacity (31ml) full cartridges and 110 sheets of TextPrint paper.

Everything Else!

You'll get an adjustable tumbler cradle along with a diverse sampling of customizable sublimation blanks, which include a case of 11oz mugs, water bottles, 20oz skinny tumblers, cork backed coasters, linen pencil bags, leather and 2-sided keychains, and square polyester pillow cases all ready for your creative designs. So go get creating!

The "I WANT IT ALL" package! Look no further, and get everything you need for your business in one convenient package. Looking to make t-shirts? Check! Drinkware? Check! Hats? Check! With this all-inclusive package, you’ll get the popular TransPro Plus 16x20" Heat Press, the versatile TransPro Plus Tumbler Mug Press, and the TransPro Quad Cap Press with 4 interchangeable platens. You'll also get the Sawgrass Virtuoso SG1000 Sublimation Printer and high-definition Siser Romeo 24" Cutter. This all-in-one package allows you to decorate virtually any product and take your business to the next level. Also included is a variety of vinyl, sublimation mugs, and accessories.

TransPro® Plus Semi Auto 16x20 Heat Press

The next generation of our TransPro Heat Presses has arrived! The TransPro Plus includes the best features of our TransPro Select line and so much more. This press offers a slide-out lower platen for easy access and the exclusive semi-auto release feature which can be changed to manual operation if needed. The press also features a pressure display ranging from 0-9 that can be set by the large pressure knob on the top of the platen.

TransPro® Plus Mug Press

Our next generation of TransPro Mug Presses has arrived! The extra long heating element gives you the ability to easily print any size skinny tumbler - including a 20oz or 30 oz skinny tumbler! The digital control panel with colorful display is simple and the stable structure makes this machine light weight and easy to operate. This press also includes a standard mug heating element to print 11 oz or 15 oz mugs and 2, 20oz skinny tumblers to get you started. We also offer other interchangeable heating elements (sold separately) to expand the type of drinkware you can sublimate on. We offer a wide latte style for printing 15 oz tapered drinkware, and a larger standard style for printing on a 30oz tumbler.

TransPro® Select Quad Cap Auto Heat Press

This is a durable cap press with digital time & temperature control. Four platens in various sizes are included to provide ease of application to most cap styles. The auto opening feature enables you to multi-task and help avoid excess application. The special design makes all the difference when using a cap press!

High Performance Sublimation Printer

The SG1000 has the compact footprint and rugged reliability of its predecessor, the SG800, but has been updated from the inside out. In addition to design improvements such as a single roll-bar, the SG1000 is more energy-efficient, prints with higher resolution, and offers WiFi connectivity. This means you’ll enjoy higher quality products and greater ease of use, at a price comparable to the previous model. We recommend using Texprint DT paper for the best results.

FREE - DesignMate Software

Access hundreds of free, customizable templates and tools to create eye-catching sublimation designs with ease. Transform your ideas into stunning masterpieces and elevate your sublimation projects with DesignMate. Check out DesignMate+ to unlock even more features, tools and templates.

Romeo™ 24″ High-Definition Cutter

This high-definition cutter includes all the amazing features from Juliet™ with double the cutting width so you can cut your production time in half. Fine detail and full-length cuts are no problem for Romeo. Equipped with high-quality blades and features that are reminiscent of large-format cutters, Romeo leads the way in professional projects. The sleek touch screen includes Siser® specific presets along with the ability to utilize the built-in registration camera, so you can print and cut with precision and accuracy. Paired with Leonardo™ Design Studio, Romeo has the power to craft possibilities into reality. Never was there a cutter more pro, than that of our trusted Romeo!

FREE - Leonardo™ Design Studio

A powerful cutter is nothing without powerful software. That’s why Leonardo™ Design Studio was created to be the perfect companion software to the Juliet® and Romeo® cutter. Easily connect to Leonardo Design Studio via the included USB cable or a WiFi connection and you’re ready to go! The best part? Leonardo Design Studio isn’t just cutting software – it’s also an incredibly versatile workspace. use the built-in canvas and tools to create your own artwork from scratch, or download premade files from the extensive art library. You can also view swatches and specs for every Siser® material, get inspiration from our handmade projects, learn new skills with tutorial videos, and so much more – all within a single software! Leonardo Design Studio is free with every Juliet purchase.

Sublimation Blanks & Materials

You get a set of 4 color (CYMK) SubliJet-UHD Ink standard-capacity full cartridges, 110 sheets of our 8.5" x 11" and 110 sheets of "4 x 9" TexPrint DT sublimation paper, and a case of 36 - 11oz mugs.

Siser Easyweed & Glitter Vinyl

You get a wide assortment of Siser's most popular heat transfer vinyl including Siser Easyweed and Siser Glitter to get you started on your next custom vinyl project.

And Loads Of Accessories

And to top it all of you will get a treasure trove of accessories to round out your platinum package which will include an adjustable tumbler cradle, a set of pressing pillows, a non-stick sheet, and thermal tape for your custom sublimation designs. This really is our most "chalked full" starter package!

products.description:
High Performance Sublimation Printer

The SG1000 has the compact footprint and rugged reliability of its predecessor, the SG800, but has been updated from the inside out. In addition to design improvements such as a single roll-bar, the SG1000 is more energy-efficient, prints with higher resolution, and offers WiFi connectivity. This means you’ll enjoy higher quality products and greater ease of use, at a price comparable to the previous model.

EasySubli Vinyl & Subli Mask

EasySubli is the latest innovation in sublimation. Unlike traditional sublimation which is limited to white polyester, this heat transfer material allows for sublimation printing on colored polyester along with other fabrics such as cotton, rayon, wool, and more. Normal sublimation transfers can require a temperature of 380°F and above, but EasySubli can be applied as low as 311°F. EasySubli is also CPSIA certified, so it’s perfect for children’s garments as well

TexPrint Paper & Sublimation Blanks

If wanting to produce a traditional sublimation print, simply print EasySubli ink on TexPrint DT paper then press that to 100% white polyester material and hard surface products coated for sublimation.

Sublimation Full Cartridge Inks Included

You get a set of 4 color (CYMK) EasySubli Ink standard-capacity cartridges.

Romeo® 24″ High-Definition Cutter

This high-definition cutter includes all the amazing features from Juliet™ with double the cutting width so you can cut your production time in half. Fine detail and full-length cuts are no problem for Romeo. Equipped with high-quality blades and features that are reminiscent of large-format cutters, Romeo leads the way in professional projects. The sleek touch screen includes Siser® specific presets along with the ability to utilize the built-in registration camera, so you can print and cut with precision and accuracy. Paired with Leonardo™ Design Studio, Romeo has the power to craft possibilities into reality. Never was there a cutter more pro, than that of our trusted Romeo!

FREE – Leonardo™ Design Studio

A powerful cutter is nothing without powerful software. That’s why Leonardo™ Design Studio was created to be the perfect companion software to the Juliet® and Romeo® cutter. Easily connect to Leonardo Design Studio via the included USB cable or a WiFi connection and you’re ready to go!

The best part? Leonardo Design Studio isn’t just cutting software – it’s also an incredibly versatile workspace. use the built-in canvas and tools to create your own artwork from scratch, or download premade files from the extensive art library. EasySubli Vinyl & Subli Mask

EasySubli is the latest innovation in sublimation. Unlike traditional sublimation which is limited to white polyester, this heat transfer material allows for sublimation printing on colored polyester along with other fabrics such as cotton, rayon, wool, and more. Normal sublimation transfers can require a temperature of 380°F and above, but EasySubli can be applied as low as 311°F. EasySubli is also CPSIA certified, so it’s perfect for children’s garments as well

products.description:
High Performance Sublimation Printer

The SG500 has the compact footprint and rugged reliability of its predecessor, the SG400, but has been updated from the inside out. In addition to design improvements such as a single roll-bar, the SG500 is more energy-efficient, prints with higher resolution, and offers WiFi connectivity. This means you’ll enjoy higher quality products and greater ease of use, at a price comparable to the previous model.

EasySubli Vinyl & Subli Mask

EasySubli is the latest innovation in sublimation. Unlike traditional sublimation which is limited to white polyester, this heat transfer material allows for sublimation printing on colored polyester along with other fabrics such as cotton, rayon, wool, and more. Normal sublimation transfers can require a temperature of 380°F and above, but EasySubli can be applied as low as 311°F. EasySubli is also CPSIA certified, so it’s perfect for children’s garments as well

TexPrint Paper & Sublimation Blanks

If wanting to produce a traditional sublimation print, simply print EasySubli ink on TexPrint DT paper then press that to 100% white polyester material and hard surface products coated for sublimation.

Sublimation Full Cartridge Inks Included

You get a set of 4 color (CYMK) EasySubli Ink standard-capacity cartridges.

FREE DesignMate Software

Access hundreds of free, customizable templates and tools to create eye-catching sublimation designs with ease. Transform your ideas into stunning masterpieces and elevate your sublimation projects with DesignMate. Check out DesignMate+ to unlock even more features, tools and templates.

FREE 1-Year Subscription To Creative Fabrica Included!
Purchase an award winning Siser vinyl cutter, and get FREE access to over 15 million graphics, fonts, and digital resources from Creative Fabrica. OFFER DETAILS >
$25 In Coupons
Free Shipping

The Siser Juliet Cutter is exactly the vinyl cutter you have been looking for! It can cut 12” wide material using the programmed cut settings. It is also extremely quiet, fast, and accurate. This package includes the cutter, accessories, and a variety of heat transfer vinyl and adhesive sign vinyl to conquer any vinyl project you may have.

Juliet® 12″ High-Definition Cutter

Juliet may look innocent enough at first, but despite the compact size and sultry shine this high-definition cutter is a cut above the rest; you might even say she’s at balcony level. From fine detail to extensive lengths, Juliet is capable of completing projects of all kinds so you can make more than ever before. The sleek touch screen includes Siser® specific presets along with a built-in registration camera, so you can print and cut with precision and accuracy. Customize your experience further with features that enable you to cut without a mat and from a roll, change cut settings on the fly, or even choose where your cut begins. If you’re looking to get the best cutter on the market for the best vinyl out there, look no further than Juliet. Whether you’re a beginning baron or a skillful lord of the decoration world, Juliet is your lady!

FREE – Leonardo™ Design Studio

A powerful cutter is nothing without powerful software. That’s why Leonardo™ Design Studio was created to be the perfect companion software to the Juliet® and Romeo® cutter. Easily connect to Leonardo Design Studio via the included USB cable or a WiFi connection and you’re ready to go!

The best part? Leonardo Design Studio isn’t just cutting software – it’s also an incredibly versatile workspace. use the built-in canvas and tools to create your own artwork from scratch, or download premade files from the extensive art library. You can also view swatches and specs for every Siser® material, get inspiration from our handmade projects, learn new skills with tutorial videos, and so much more – all within a single software! Leonardo Design Studio is free with every Juliet purchase.

Siser Easyweed Heat Transfer Vinyl

You get a start up pack of our most popular Siser Easyweed heat transfer vinyl. This package includes a variety of EasyPSV Starling decorative vinyl and Easyweed garment vinyl to get you up and running on your first custom vinyl project.

And Loads Of Accessories

And to top it all of you will get treasure trove of accessories to round out your package which will include a weeding tool, a non-stick sheet, a squeegee, a siser color guide, and EasyPSV tape. Everything you need to get started in garment and sign vinyl.

Included Coupons

  • $25 Off all digital art.
  • 1 coupon per order. Cannot be combined with other coupons or promotions. The entire value of the coupon must be used on a single order.
products.additional_information:
Features
More Information
SKU BUN-070

Juliet 12" & Romeo 24" High Definition Cutter Features

Searching for the perfect cutter that will take your business to the next level? Look no further than the Juliet and Romeo! Fine detail and full-length cuts are no problem for these cutters. Equipped with high-quality blades and features that are reminiscent of large-format cutters, these cutters leads the way in professional projects. The sleek touch screen includes Siser® specific presets along with the ability to utilize the built-in registration camera, so you can print and cut with precision and accuracy. Paired with Leonardo™ Design Studio, Juliet and Romeo have the power to craft possibilities into reality. Never were there cutters more pro, than that of our trusted Juliet or Romeo!

Quiet, Detailed Power at Your Fingertips

Juliet and Romeo are high definition cutting machines capable of cutting the finest details in a variety of materials. Both is designed for all Siser® heat transfer vinyl and EasyPSV® decal vinyl via the pre installed cut settings, but works superbly with other materials such as cardstock, stickers, craft foam and much more. Cut rolled materials from 12″ to 24″ as well as longer sheets. Juliet and Romeo cutters give you the freedom to create on your terms and with the materials you’re already familiar with and use on a daily basis. Both are a full-featured, professional cutting machine that just so happens to be quiet, fast and able to cut intricate designs! Great for stepping up to a professional cutter for bigger jobs.

Pre-Set Cutter Settings

Take the guesswork out of cutting. Juliet and Romeo come with dozens of pre-set cut settings for all Siser materials. You can even create your own custom cut settings!

Adjustable Pinch Rollers

Thanks to adjustable pinch rollers, you’re not limited to a specific cut area. Utilize the entire width of the cutter for your projects. Cut with or without a cutting mat.

WiFi Connection

Have a jumbled mess of cords connected to your computer? We get it. That’s why Romeo can connect to your PC or MAC via WiFi for a reliable wireless experience!

Built In Camera

Print and Cut projects are a breeze thanks to our built-in camera on the cutter head. Romeo can read registration marks and cut full color designs with ease!

High Definition

Small details equal huge potential! Thanks to pinpoint accuracy, Juliet and Romeo can cut some of the most intricate details with precision down to .01mm without skipping a beat!

It Can Draw

Juliet and Romeo do more than just cut! Create beautifully drawn designs using Siser Sublimation Markers (or other drawing utensils) with the included marker adapter.

Leonardo Design Studio

Leonardo Design Studio isn’t just powerful cutting software – it’s also an incredibly versatile workspace. Use the built-in canvas and tools to create your own artwork from scratch, or download pre-made files from the extensive art library. You can also view swatches and specs for every Siser material, get inspiration from our handmade projects, learn new skills with tutorial videos, and so much more – all within a single software! Leonardo Design Studio is free with every Juliet and Romeo purchase.
